remarks: The inner product of a vector with itself is the square of the vector's norm.  Equation I4 of [Ponnusamy] p. 362.  (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ipid.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
ipid.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
ipid.7 $e |- P = ( .iOLD ` U ) $.
ipidsq $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X ) -> ( A P A ) = ( ( N ` A ) ^ 2 ) ) $.
